reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be of great quality, with one noting its high-quality stitching, and appreciate its dressy style that makes it suitable for office wear. The garment is lightweight, soft, and comes in nice colors, while one customer mentions it's roomy without being baggy. Customers describe the fabric as nice, and they find it comfortable to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty, good fit and easy care.
items.body: A soft pretty sweater with rich color. Accurate fit for my usual size. Cool, delicate wash; low dryer briefly, then lay flat to finish. Medium weight sweater - I trusted it to buy two different colors and I am very pleased with them. Read more
items.author: Suzanne J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Foundational Wardrobe piece
items.body: I ordered it yesterday and it arrived today. It’s a great, stylish sweater that’s a value for the price. The fit is true to size. The fabric has a sheen to it and is light weight. It will be cool for warm fall or spring days; however, it will work well to layer when it’s cooler weather. It’s roomy without being baggy. There are wrinkles right out of the package, but a steamer will take care of that. I think I’ll wash in a lingerie bag to prevent snags. I’m glad I bought to colors of this great, basic piece. Read more
items.author: Esther

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dressier than a T-Shirt
items.body: This is a nice lightweight Fall top. The details dress it up a little which is nice. It seems to be a somewhat relaxed style and doesn't cling to my round tummy. I'm 5' 7" and 190 lbs. and the 2XL fit me loosely-- which is what I prefer. The sleeves are extra long and fit my long arms with a couple inches to spare. If I had a nice trim middle the XL would have fit well. Sizing up is more comfortable for me. Read more
items.author: Htalk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Nice sweater, high quality stitching and soft fabric. The lace type pattern at the top makes it just a little different from a typical crew neck solid sweater. It is lightweight. I like the elastic on the bottom so it's not just hanging, gives it a little more refined look. I am 5'2, 119 lbs and a 34C and couldn't decide between S and M based on size charts so ordered both. The small is definitely the best one for me. It fits well, fitted just enough to not look messy but not so much that it's tight whereas the medium looked oversized. I've taken a photo of them on top of each other so you can see. The coffee color is the small, the white is the medium. You can see that the sleeves are the same length and the bodice of the medium is slightly longer but not much. The difference is in the width. The medium is about a half inch bigger on each side. Read more
items.author: angela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the price!
items.body: You cannot beat these shirts for the price. I ordered one and was so pleased with the quality, fabric, and a fit that I ordered two more. So far they have washed up very well and they are casual enough to wear with jeans but also dressy enough to wear to the office. I'm 138 lb and the small fits me great. Read more
items.author: Aurora Phillips

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty colors and nice fit.
items.body: I love this sweater so much I ordered another one in a different color. Very soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: TexasRee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: Cute, comfy, lightweight. Perfect sweater to throw on. Read more
items.author: EDef

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute top!
items.body: I wasn’t sure about this sweater’s material but thought I’d give it a try. I’m glad I did. The fit is really cute. Hits just at my hips and is fitted but not tight at all. This could be dressed up or down. Love the detail at the top. Might look for others from this brand. Read more
items.author: jennifer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Winered, Camarel, White, Blue, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
